review: I bought this to replace my faulty Apple TV version 1. It is a definite improvement in all functions. It is smaller, uses less power, and has an auto-off function that I don't think version 1 had The programming options are many, although similar to all the other boxes out there. It hooks up seamlessly to my network and is a no-brainer if you have an iPad or iPhone, because with Airdrop you can stream easily from either device to the set.

author: Joanne Boenig

review: I wanted to be able to sit in my easy chair with my iPad and select movies and play them on the TV without having to get up. Well after reading reviews that this baby could NOT stream amazon prime free movies I was ready to box it up for return.  I kept digging  and after a few hours discovered that there was a new app that would allow this very feature through airplay.  It got terrible reviews but I installed it anyway.  The app has worked perfectly for me. Also, after seeing this in action my daughter got an Apple TV also and the app works perfectly for her.  She loves the music too.Go to App Store and search for "amazon instant video".
author: M. Thompson "Dyson Diva"
